column1: The '''Southern Army''' was the smaller of the two armies formed by King [[Ondoher]] of [[Gondor]]
column2: to protect his kingdom against the double threat of the [[Wainriders]] to the northeast
column3: and the [[Haradrim]] to the south. The command of the Southern Army was given to [[Eärnil II|Eärnil]]
column4: a descendant of the royal line of Gondor.<ref>{{App|Gondor}}</ref>
